name: OCKAdherenceQuery
desc: A query that constrains the results when you fetch adherence from a store.

items.name: init(taskIDs: [String], dateInterval: DateInterval, aggregator: OCKAdherenceAggregator)
items.desc: Creates a new query with a specific task identifier, dates, and aggregator.

items.name: var aggregator: OCKAdherenceAggregator
items.desc: An aggregator that computes an adherence value from a series of events.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: A date interval for entities that match the query.

items.name: var taskIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of task identifiers you can use to match tasks in the query-returned results.
